mdx.excerpt: It's been over seven months since  I joined Shopify  and I am overdue on a blog post about my experiences so far. I want to give a little update on my time here: a Shopify Update or, "Shopifupdate", if you will. The tl;dr is that things are going very well! If you're interested in more detail, read on.
